content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Of course, Mr. Li. I'm glad you could make it. So, what price are you looking to pay for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: 25 square meters is the size of the apartment. My goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. I am dependable and responsible, so I think I would be a good tenant. Is there any interest in my proposal?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I see. Well, I appreciate your interest in the apartment, Mr. Li. However, I'm afraid I can't accept your proposed rental price at this time. The market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this area is quite high, and I need to maximize my returns as a landlord. That being said, I'm open to negotiating a fair rental price that works for both of us. What's your ideal rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
250 Euros per month. Is that possible?

I am dependable and responsible, so I think I would be a good tenant. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am a student, so I don't have a lot of income.

I am open to negotiate a fair rental price that works for both of us.

I would like to accept this rental price of 250 Euros per month.

TERMINATE.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I see, Mr. Li. Thank you for your interest in the apartment and for your offer. However, I'm afraid I can't accept your proposed rental price of 250 Euros per month. The market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this area is quite high, and I need to maximize my returns as a landlord. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, but I'm unable to negotiate a rental price that's lower than the market rate. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Heinrich Heine
